name: Silly Stack
description:
Stuff are getting messy! We have to grab them all and make sure the floor is clean.
But I hate tidying...... OK then let's do some Silly Stacking!

Place All the items and make sure you get everything!
Don't drop anything to the floor or you'll have to restart all over again.
Show your stacking skill by getting all the stars!

Features :
* Cute and fun theme
* Super easy gameplay mechanic
* lots of items to play around with
* Dynamic and realistic physics
* Crazy fun and challenging puzzle, can you solve them all?
